official_title: A bill authorizing the President of the United States to present a gold medal to each of the individuals held hostage in the U.S. Embassy in Iran.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to present, in the name of Congress, gold medals to each of the individuals held hostage in the United States Embassy in Iran. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to strike a gold medal with suitable emblems, devices, and inscriptions.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the President of the United States to present a gold medal to each of the individuals held hostage in the U.S. Embassy in Iran.
